code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ClipboardCopy(){var CopyLink=function CopyLink(text){if(!document.queryCommandSupported("copy")){return alert("복사하기가 지원되지 않는 브라우저입니다.");}var textArea=document.createElement("textarea");textArea.value=text;textArea.style.top=0;textArea.style.left=0;textArea.style.display="fixed";document.body.appendChild(textArea);textArea.focus();textArea.select();document.execCommand("copy");document.body.removeChild(textArea);alert("클립보드에 복사되었습니다.");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"CopyLinkBtn",onClick:function onClick(){return CopyLink(window.location.href);},children:"copy link"});}
